short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you an online shopaholic? Get this extension to help you make better decisions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is designed to help you curb those late-night shopping spree addictions! A questioning pop-up will now show up every time you are about to checkout with your items, along with some helpful information on how to stay sustainable while online shopping!
